_header: For he is full young tender of age
_description: John Audelay, ‘De rege nostro Henrico Sexto’ — sixteen quatrains (aaab) plus burden (bb): ‘A perles pryns to the we pray / Saue our kyng both nyght and day’

BodDou302.First Lines:
ffore he is ful ȝong tender of ageSemele to se o bold
                    corage…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…ffor him schal wepe mone an eþus prophecis þe blynd
                    awdlay
